title: If Elon Musk Had Been a Happy Child, Would He Still Be Launching Rockets?
description: “Biographer of Genius” Walter Isaacson thinks he cracked the code to Elon Musk—the entrepreneur’s brutal childhood fueled his frenzied achievements in space, AI, brain chips, and electric cars.

title: Teachers Are Going All In on Generative AI
description: Surveys suggest teachers use generative AI more than students, to create lesson plans or more interesting word problems. Educators say it can save valuable time but must be used carefully.
